name: Task
description: A task or todo item with rich details

userId.description: ID of the user who owns this task (references User.id)

description.description: Detailed description of the task (supports rich text)

priority.description: Priority level: High, Medium, or Low

status.description: Current status: todo, in-progress, or completed

listId.description: ID of the list this task belongs to

deleted.description: Soft delete flag - task is in trash

deletedAt.description: Timestamp when task was moved to trash

recurrencePattern.description: Recurrence pattern: daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, custom

recurrenceDays.description: Specific days for weekly recurrence (Mon, Tue, Wed, etc.)

recurrenceEndDate.description: Optional end date for recurrence series

parentRecurringTaskId.description: ID of the parent recurring task template
